summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClinique Quickliner For Brows is an ultra-fine pencil brow liner that lasts all day.
details: DetailsBenefitsThis convenient eyebrow pencil creates perfectly defined, natural-looking brows with color that lasts all day.The ultra-fine tip fills even the smallest gaps with precise, hair-like strokes.Pencil automatically self-sharpens and glides on without skipping or tugging.24-hour smudge and budge-resistant wear.Ophthalmologist tested.Appropriate for people with sensitive eyes.Appropriate for contact lens wearers.No parabens. No phthalates. Allergy tested. 100% fragrance free.Item 2590270How To UseApply eyebrow pencil in direction of hair growth using light, feathery strokes to create natural definition. Fill in sparse areas as needed.IngredientsDiisostearyl Malate, Triethylhexanoin, C20-40 Acid, C20-40 Alcohols, Polyethylene, Synthetic Wax, Glyceryl Behenate/Eicosadioate, Ethylene/Propylene Copolymer, Ethylcellulose, Boron Nitride, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Vp/Eicosene Copolymer. May Contain: Mica, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Copper Powder (CI 77400), Aluminum Powder (CI 77000), Bismuth Oxychloride (CI 77163), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Ultramarines (CI 77007), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Chromium Hydroxide Green (CI 77289), Chromium Oxide Greens (CI 77288), Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide (CI 77510), Manganese Violet (CI 77742), Bronze Powder (CI 77400), Ferric Ferrocyanide (CI 77510), Carmine (CI 75470).Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply eyebrow pencil in direction of hair growth using light, feathery strokes to create natural definition. Fill in sparse areas as needed.

reviews.headline: It's just  okay
reviews.comments: It's just okay. I t goes on smoothly, but does require a reapply after the first brush through. I don't think I'd buy it again.

reviews.headline: My Favorite Brow Pencil
reviews.comments: No matter what else I try, I always go back to this wonderful brow pencil. It's easy to use, not messy at all, and the color match is perfect. My sparse brows look perfect every single time. I highly recommend this product.

reviews.headline: I really like it goes on smooth
reviews.comments: Great product my go to for brows

reviews.headline: My Favorite Eyebrow Pencil
reviews.comments: I highly recommend this eyebrow pencil it's is easy to use stays on until you take it off at night and the opposite side that is a brush blend it very well!!

reviews.headline: Easy to use but does not last as long as I had hoped
reviews.comments: This is my first venture with eyebrow pencil so I do not have a general idea of how long they are supposed to last.  I can say however, I was expecting this product to last longer than it did.  The product wears down quickly and can leave excess color in places.  While I like the color and have been a Clinique loyalist for a long time, I will be trying other brands.

reviews.headline: buy again
reviews.comments: very good

reviews.headline: Clinique Quickliner for Brows
reviews.comments: Your salesperson taught me how to use this pencil on my brows. I had tried many products over the last few weeks and I was at my wits end. This eyebrow liner works quick and easily and looks very natural. I would definitely recommend.

reviews.headline: I love this product I'll buy it again and again
reviews.comments: Fantastic product I'll buy it over and over

reviews.headline: Good product, Too expensive
reviews.comments: I really like this eyebrow pencil, however, you go through the pencil very quickly if using daily. It's too expensive for the amount that's in the pencil. I've found others just as good, but last longer.

reviews.headline: MY GO-TO BROW LINER
reviews.comments: I've tried many brow products over the years, and this is the only one I keep coming back to. The color is perfect (soft brown) and the coverage is just enough but not too much. I highly recommen.

reviews.headline: This is my go to brow pencil
reviews.comments: Clinique is the only brand that I have found my exact eyebrow color.  I use soft brown and it's a perfect match.  Other eyebrow pencils are too orangey or too light or too dark.

reviews.headline: Love this eyebrow pencil.
reviews.comments: Easy to use, can be very precise in drawing in your eyebrows, does not pull on the skin.

reviews.headline: happy with this product
reviews.comments: my eyebrow are naturally super dark and this is one of the first eyebrow pencils i found that matches my brows (undertone matching as well) easy to use and natural looking

reviews.headline: Great eyebrow pencil
reviews.comments: I bought a soft brown pencil. Best color with NO RED hue. Just a nice natural soft brown.

reviews.headline: I've used this pencil for years
reviews.comments: I can draw fine brow lines and the color is perfect.

reviews.headline: No, this retractable pencil broke at each use.
reviews.comments: This pencil broke at each usage.  I used it three times and the the pencil is completely gone....

reviews.headline: I have used Clinique Quickliner for Brows for years!
reviews.comments: This is a tried and true product for me! I have used it for years and still am very happy with the results. I wish it would last longer, but that is the only negative I can find with it. It goes on so easily with great results every time.

reviews.headline: Yes I would buy again
reviews.comments: Employees extremely helpful and pleasant.

reviews.headline: I hate this product
reviews.comments: Not happy with this product at all.

reviews.headline: I'm still undecided about the eyebrow pencil
reviews.comments: No comment

media.headline: Not worth price
media.caption: Pulled the package apart just to make sure some liner wasn't stuck in the tube and realized the tube that holds the liner was only 1.5"

media.headline: Pleasantly Surprised
media.caption: I had my makeup on and took this picture after 10 hours of me wearing all products! VERY pleased with my purchase!

faceoff_positive.comments: I was at Ulta and having trouble finding the right color of brow, pencil that wasn't too waxy. When one consultant couldn't help me find anything in the sea of cosmetic brands, he asked another for help and she brought me right to Clinique counter. The soft chestnut looked to be the right color (close enough)... but would it be soft enough for effortless placement, check. Was the tip skinny enough for realistic hairlike strokes? 1/2 check. Yes at first, then no with no way to sharpen... but it's the best one I have found so far. Does it stay on? Check. I train horses in the Texas heat and it's still on at the end of the day. Impressive! and will be repurchasing! Is there a lot of product for the money? This is the biggest drawback to this pencil along with not being able to keep the tip sharp. I ran out of product in less than a month, so it gets costly. I will repurchase when it's on sale. Please make pencils for strawberry blonde hair. We do not have bright red or auburn hair and the names of the colors make it difficult to find a match. Just name the colors to whom they are intended. Within the sea of pencils, I thought Clinique had nothing to offer me and had it not been for the Ulta consultant, I would have had no idea Soft Chestnut existed. All over, I subtracted one point, because it's good, not perfect!
faceoff_positive.headline: Finally something for strawberry blondes!

faceoff_negative.comments:
First I want to say I love, love, love this brow pencil, the fine point makes it so easy to add the fine lines I need to fill in my brows and the color I use is perfect and I've been using it since you introduced it.
But then there's the quantity of product vs the price; 
It's always been a lot to pay for a product that lasts about 30 days but since it works so well for me I continued to purchase it. 
I tried the brow shaper to fill in and that was a fail because the brush applies too much product. Recently I purchased the Clinique Brow pencil with highlighter, another fail because the pencil so thick it blots out the fine lines of the quickliner. 
Then last month I ordered a new quickliner not realizing the product had been changed and the price had gone up considerably.. The spoolie you've is too small and hard to be useful and considering the price for a 30 day supply was already too high and now it's even higher. For me those changes make this a fail as well. 
If you could make the container longer why not add more product instead of a useless brush ??? 
You've lost me with this latest "improvement". 
I've used Clinique products for over 35 years, love that none of your products irritate my skin and will continue to use the skin care line as well as a your lipliner and mascara but even though I haven't been happy with other brow pencils I've tried I'll have to find another company's product I can make do with.
faceoff_negative.headline: Too little product and now more expensive
